name: ProtectionType
title: Protection Type
description: Protection Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: On-site personnel providing physical security monitoring and surveillance.
Fire hydrants providing water supply access for firefighting operations.
Professional firefighting service available to respond to fire emergencies.
Portable fire extinguisher using water as the extinguishing agent.
Portable fire extinguisher using dry chemical powder as the extinguishing agent.
Portable fire extinguisher using foam as the extinguishing agent.
Glass material designed to resist breaking or shattering under impact.
Fixed piping system with hose connections for firefighting water delivery within a building.
Fire-rated wall extension above the roof to prevent fire spread between adjacent sections.
Perimeter barrier structure used to restrict access to a property.
Visible signage used to alert or deter potential intruders or trespassers.
Trained canine used for security and property protection purposes.
Equipment or safe physically secured to the floor structure to prevent removal.
Mechanism that automatically re-secures a lock when tampering is detected.
Additional mass added to a safe to make it more difficult to move or steal.

designation.value: Peso extra agregado a la caja fuerte

concept.definition: Complete boundary fencing system with access point that can be secured with a lock.

designation.value: Cerca perimetral y portón con cerradura

concept.definition: Outdoor illumination system used to increase visibility and deter unauthorized access.
Building entry points that have clear sightlines from public roadways.
Lighting system that activates automatically when movement is detected.

designation.value: Éclairage activé par détecteur de mouvements

concept.definition: Continuous nighttime lighting of the property or lot area.
Safe embedded within concrete structure for enhanced theft protection.

concept.display: Secured or Fastened to the Premises (Other Than Floor)
concept.definition: Equipment physically attached to building structure such as walls or ceiling.

designation.value: Fixé ou attaché sur les lieux (autre que le plancher)
Asegurado o fijado a las instalaciones (que no sea el piso)

concept.definition: Metal bars installed over windows, doors, or other openings to prevent forced entry.

concept.display: Windows Protected with Glass Breakage Detectors
concept.definition: Sensor system that detects the sound or vibration of breaking glass.

designation.value: Fenêtres protégées par des détecteurs de bris de verre
Ventanas protegidas con detectores de rotura de vidrio

concept.display: Common Tenant Walls Reinforced with Steel Mesh
concept.definition: Shared walls between tenants strengthened with steel mesh material to prevent break-through.

designation.value: Murs mitoyens renforcés d'armature en treillis métallique
Paredes comunes reforzadas con malla de acero

concept.display: Steel Post at Front and Rear to Prevent Vehicle Entry
concept.definition: Metal bollards positioned to block unauthorized vehicle access to the property.

designation.value: Poteau d'acier à l'avant et à l'arrière pour empêcher l'entrée des véhicules
Poste de acero al frente y atrás para prevenir entrada de vehículos

concept.display: Stock Secured - Separate Enclosure When Business Closed
concept.definition: Inventory stored in a dedicated secured area when the business is not operating.

designation.value: Marchandises protégées - Dans un enclos séparé en-dehors des heures d'affaires
Inventario asegurado - Recinto separado cuando el negocio está cerrado

concept.display: Exterior Doors of Sturdy Construction, Inside Hinges
concept.definition: External doors made from durable materials with hinges mounted on the interior side.

designation.value: Portes extérieures de construction solide, charnières intérieures
Puertas exteriores de construcción robusta, bisagras interiores

concept.definition: Emergency panic buttons that silently alert authorities during a robbery in progress.

designation.value: Boutons d'urgence en cas de cambriolage

concept.display: Windows Protected by ULC Security Film
concept.definition: Window protection film meeting Canadian Underwriters Laboratories standards for security.

designation.value: Fenêtres protégées par une pellicule de sécurité homologuée ULC
Ventanas protegidas por película de seguridad ULC

concept.display: Skylight and Roof Air Conditioner Openings Blocked Off
concept.definition: Roof penetrations sealed or blocked to prevent unauthorized access from above.

designation.value: Ouvertures des lanterneaux et des climatiseurs en toiture obturées
Aberturas de tragaluz y aire acondicionado en techo bloqueadas

concept.definition: Alarm system using thin wire circuits that trigger when openings are breached.

designation.value: Système d'alarme "fil électrique fin" protégeant les ouvertures

concept.display: Loading Doors of Metal Construction, Secured Internally
concept.definition: Cargo access doors made of metal with locking mechanisms accessible only from inside.

designation.value: Portes de l'aire de chargement en métal, protégées de l'intérieur
Puertas de carga de construcción metálica, aseguradas internamente

concept.display: Warehouse Area Alarmed Separately from Office
concept.definition: Storage area equipped with an independent alarm system distinct from office space alarms.

designation.value: Entrepôt muni d'un système d'alarme distinct du bureau
Área de almacén con alarma separada de la oficina

concept.display: Stockroom Ceiling Entirely Covered by Motion Sensor
concept.definition: Complete overhead coverage of storage area with motion detection technology.

designation.value: Plafond de l'entrepôt entièrement couvert par un détecteur de mouvement
Techo del almacén totalmente cubierto por sensor de movimiento

concept.definition: Supplementary locking mechanism requiring a numeric or alphanumeric code to open.
Use of different types of locking mechanisms on the same door or safe.
Secure deposit opening for after-hours cash or document deposits into a safe.
Extra physical key required in combination with existing lock mechanisms.
Lock mechanism with time-delayed or scheduled access control.
Enclosed ventilated area for paint spraying operations with fire safety features.
System for capturing airborne particulate matter to reduce fire and health hazards.
Perimeter fencing equipped with locking mechanisms at access points.
Regular law enforcement monitoring of the property area.
Security alarm system specifically installed for vehicle parking facility protection.

designation.value: Système d'alarme (Garage de stationnement automobile seulement)

concept.definition: Secure lockable container for storing valuables, cash, or documents.
Devices that sense smoke particles in the air and trigger an alarm.
Mobile fire suppression devices that can be carried to the location of a fire.
Metal shutters that roll down to cover and protect windows or doors.
Video surveillance system with active monitoring by security personnel or service.
Video recording system without real-time monitoring, used for post-incident review.
Automated water-based fire suppression system activated by heat detection.
Electronic system managing and monitoring entry permissions through cards, codes, or biometrics.
Lock mechanism where a solid metal bolt extends into the door frame for enhanced security.
Closed-circuit television system capturing and storing video footage.
